1.title: NETWORK ENGINEER
1.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled Network Engineer to design, implement, maintain, and support our growing network infrastructure. The ideal candidate will ensure the stability and integrity of in-house data, voice, video, and wireless network services through planning, design, and continuous monitoring.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, configure, and maintain LAN, WAN, and VPN networks.

Monitor network performance and troubleshoot connectivity issues.

Install, configure, and manage firewalls, routers, switches, and wireless access points.

Ensure network security through access controls, firewalls, and regular updates.

Collaborate with system administrators and security teams to optimize network operations.

Perform regular network maintenance and capacity planning.

Document network configurations, diagrams, and procedures.

Support disaster recovery and backup plans related to network infrastructure.
1.requirements:
Preferred Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.

Certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, CompTIA Network+, or Juniper JNCIA.

1–3 years of hands-on network administration experience.
